p: The pharmacological network included 59 nodes and 189 relation pairs ( Figure 5). Among the 59 nodes were 2 herbal medicine nodes ( Salvia miltiorrhiza and Astragalus mongholicus), 8 chemical component nodes (magnesium lithospermate B, neocryptotanshinone II, heteratisine, daphneolone, tanshinone IIA, tanshinone IIB, soyasapogenol B, and astragaloside II), 27 target protein nodes (such as TNF, IL-6, NFKB1, APOA1, APOA2, CYP1A1, and CYP1A2), and 22 pathway nodes (such as toll-like receptor signaling pathway, IL-17 signaling pathway, and TNF signaling pathway).
